overview: Music film with the band Sven-Ingvars. The band plays travelling musicians from 19th century VÃ¤rmland, who are commissioned to save an earl's daughter, who has been kidnapped by an evil and music-hating officer. The band travels to USA and the dangerous town of Desperado City. Here they meet Indians and bandits, look for gold and take part in a bar brawl.
title: Under ditt parasoll
